type.label: Alphabet
type.description: A container for symbols (letters) that represent the distinctive sounds of a language.

type.label: Dialect
type.description: A folder to contain a language's various artificats including words.

type.label: Dictionary
type.description: A Dictionary will include all the Words from a specific language.

type.label: Media Gallery
type.description: This is a container for images that appear as part of a slideshow inside a Language Portal.

type.label: Guide
type.description: A document type to contain steps for interactive user guides.

type.label: Language
type.description: A workspace to house different languages.

type.label: Page
type.description: A generic document type to represent a page on the site.

type.label: Language Portal
type.description: A Portal to contain general information and resources related to the language, generally for public consumption via the web.

type.label: Resources
type.description: A folder type to store images, audio and video that are shared within the language family, language, or dialect.

labels.label: You can customize this form from Studio: Content Model> Documents > Folder > Creation Layout

properties.property: This layout can be configured on the "Create Layout" tab of this document type in Studio
This layout can be configured on the "Edit Layout" tab of this document type in Studio
This layout can be configured on the "View Layout" tab of this document type in Studio

helpLabels.label: Whether this is the primary alphabet
Equivalent fuzzy latin match for search, e.g. h -> h
For example: Lips, Tongue Tip, Tongue back, Throat
What type of contributor are they? Speaker, Recorder, Photographer etc
What is their role? Speaker, photographer etc
What is their role? Speaker, photographer etc
GUID of the parent Language. Advanced users only.
GUID of the parent Family. Advanced users only.

This layout can be configured on the "Edit Layout" tab of this document type in Studio
This layout can be configured on the "View Layout" tab of this document type in Studio

The DOM selector to attach to, ending with top,bottom,left or right

helpLabels.label: Do not include 'http' or slashes, e.g. 'contribute'
Do not include 'http' or slashes, e.g. 'contribute'

whereClause.fixedPart: ecm:mixinType != 'HiddenInNavigation' AND ecm:isCheckedInVersion = 0 AND ecm:isTrashed = 0 and ecm:parentId= ?
ecm:mixinType != 'HiddenInNavigation' AND ecm:isCheckedInVersion = 0 AND ecm:isTrashed= 0 and ecm:parentId= ? AND ecm:primaryType = "FVCharacter"
ecm:mixinType != 'HiddenInNavigation' AND ecm:isCheckedInVersion = 0 AND ecm:isTrashed =0 and ecm:parentId= ?
ecm:mixinType != 'HiddenInNavigation' AND ecm:isCheckedInVersion = 0 AND ecm:isTrashed =0 and ecm:parentId= ? AND ecm:primaryType = "FVPhrase"
ecm:mixinType != 'HiddenInNavigation' AND ecm:isCheckedInVersion = 0 AND ecm:isTrashed =0 and ecm:parentId= ?
ecm:mixinType != 'HiddenInNavigation' AND ecm:isCheckedInVersion = 0 AND ecm:isTrashed =0 and ecm:parentId= ? AND ecm:primaryType = "FVWord"
ecm:mixinType != 'HiddenInNavigation' AND ecm:isCheckedInVersion = 0 AND ecm:isTrashed =0 and ecm:parentId= ? AND ecm:primaryType = "INNounEnding"

genericPageProvider.pattern: SELECT * FROM Document WHERE (ecm:mixinType != 'HiddenInNavigation' AND ecm:isCheckedInVersion = 0 AND ecm:isTrashed =0 and ecm:parentId= ? AND ecm:primaryType = "INPhrase")

whereClause.fixedPart: ecm:mixinType != 'HiddenInNavigation' AND ecm:isCheckedInVersion = 0 AND ecm:isTrashed =0 and ecm:parentId= ? AND ecm:primaryType = "INVerbEnding"

coreQueryPageProvider.pattern: SELECT * FROM Document WHERE (ecm:mixinType != 'HiddenInNavigation' AND ecm:isCheckedInVersion = 0 AND ecm:isTrashed =0 AND dc:title ILIKE '%?%' AND ecm:primaryType = 'FVPhrase')

transition.name: Enable
transition.description: Make document available to members again.

state.name: Enabled
state.description: Document is enabled and visible to dialect members.

state.name: Disabled
state.description: Document is only available to language administrators or recorders.

state.name: project
state.description: Temp state for legacy life cycle

state.name: Republish
state.description: Intermediate state before publishing again (a state can't do back to itself).

scriptedOperation.description: Fill the ancestors of a document for easy access.
Automation script that ensures that pictures and words relations are kept in sync.
Fill the ancestors of a document for easy access.
Duplicate document property from the KQT variation

templateItem.title: * Draft Documents
templateItem.description: Location of drafts for the documents being edited

corsConfig.name: firstVoicesCors
corsConfig.supportedMethods: GET, POST, HEAD, OPTIONS, PUT, DELETE

genericPageProvider.name: get_dialects
genericPageProvider.pattern: SELECT * FROM FVPortal WHERE ecm:path STARTSWITH '/FV/?/' AND ecm:isTrashed =0 AND ecm:isVersion = 0

genericPageProvider.name: get_words
genericPageProvider.pattern: SELECT * FROM FVWord WHERE ecm:path STARTSWITH '/FV/?/' AND ecm:isTrashed =0 AND ecm:isCheckedInVersion = 0

coreQueryPageProvider.name: featured_word_suggestion
coreQueryPageProvider.pattern: SELECT * FROM FVWord WHERE (ecm:path STARTSWITH '/FV/' AND ecm:mixinType != 'HiddenInNavigation' AND ecm:isCheckedInVersion = 0 AND ecm:isTrashed =0 AND ecm:currentLifeCycleState != 'Disabled' AND ecm:currentLifeCycleState != 'New' AND dc:title ILIKE '?%' AND ecm:ancestorId = '?')

coreQueryPageProvider.name: contributor_suggestion
coreQueryPageProvider.pattern: SELECT * FROM FVContributor WHERE (ecm:path STARTSWITH '/FV/Workspaces/' AND ecm:mixinType != 'HiddenInNavigation' AND ecm:isCheckedInVersion = 0 AND ecm:isTrashed =0 AND ecm:currentLifeCycleState != 'Disabled' AND ecm:currentLifeCycleState != 'New' AND dc:title ILIKE '?%' AND ecm:ancestorId = '?')

coreQueryPageProvider.name: category_suggestion
coreQueryPageProvider.pattern: SELECT * FROM FVCategory WHERE ecm:mixinType != 'HiddenInNavigation' AND ecm:isCheckedInVersion = 0 AND ecm:isTrashed =0 AND ecm:currentLifeCycleState != 'Disabled' AND ecm:currentLifeCycleState != 'New' AND dc:title ILIKE '?%' AND (ecm:path STARTSWITH '?' OR ecm:path STARTSWITH '/FV/Workspaces/SharedData') ORDER BY dc:title ASC

coreQueryPageProvider.name: phrasebook_suggestion
coreQueryPageProvider.pattern: SELECT * FROM FVCategory WHERE ecm:mixinType != 'HiddenInNavigation' AND ecm:isCheckedInVersion = 0 AND ecm:isTrashed =0 AND ecm:currentLifeCycleState != 'Disabled' AND ecm:currentLifeCycleState != 'New' AND dc:title ILIKE '?%' AND ecm:path STARTSWITH '?' ORDER BY dc:title ASC

coreQueryPageProvider.name: link_suggestion
coreQueryPageProvider.pattern: SELECT * FROM FVLink WHERE (ecm:path STARTSWITH '/FV/Workspaces/' AND ecm:mixinType != 'HiddenInNavigation' AND ecm:isCheckedInVersion = 0 AND ecm:isTrashed =0 AND dc:title ILIKE '?%' AND (ecm:ancestorId = '?' OR fva:dialect IS NULL))

coreQueryPageProvider.name: link_suggestion_dialect
coreQueryPageProvider.pattern: SELECT * FROM FVLink WHERE (ecm:path STARTSWITH '/FV/' AND ecm:mixinType != 'HiddenInNavigation' AND ecm:isCheckedInVersion = 0 AND ecm:isTrashed =0 AND dc:title ILIKE '?%' AND (ecm:ancestorId = '?' OR fva:dialect IS NULL))

coreQueryPageProvider.name: all_word_suggestion
coreQueryPageProvider.pattern: SELECT * FROM FVWord WHERE (ecm:path STARTSWITH '/FV/' AND ecm:mixinType != 'HiddenInNavigation' AND ecm:isCheckedInVersion = 0 AND ecm:isTrashed =0 AND ecm:currentLifeCycleState != 'Disabled' AND ecm:currentLifeCycleState != 'New' AND dc:title ILIKE '?%')

coreQueryPageProvider.name: all_phrase_suggestion
coreQueryPageProvider.pattern: SELECT * FROM FVPhrase WHERE (ecm:path STARTSWITH '/FV/' AND ecm:mixinType != 'HiddenInNavigation' AND ecm:isCheckedInVersion = 0 AND ecm:isTrashed =0 AND ecm:currentLifeCycleState != 'Disabled' AND ecm:currentLifeCycleState != 'New' AND dc:title ILIKE '?%')

coreQueryPageProvider.name: dialect_word_suggestion
coreQueryPageProvider.pattern: SELECT * FROM FVWord WHERE (ecm:path STARTSWITH '/FV/' AND ecm:mixinType != 'HiddenInNavigation' AND ecm:isCheckedInVersion = 0 AND ecm:isTrashed =0 AND dc:title ILIKE '%?%' AND ecm:ancestorId = '?')

coreQueryPageProvider.name: dialect_phrase_suggestion
coreQueryPageProvider.pattern: SELECT * FROM FVPhrase WHERE (ecm:path STARTSWITH '/FV/' AND ecm:mixinType != 'HiddenInNavigation' AND ecm:isCheckedInVersion = 0 AND ecm:isTrashed =0 AND dc:title ILIKE '%?%' AND ecm:ancestorId = '?')

coreQueryPageProvider.name: all_phrases_and_words_suggestion
coreQueryPageProvider.pattern: SELECT * FROM Document WHERE (ecm:path STARTSWITH '/FV/' AND ecm:mixinType != 'HiddenInNavigation' AND ecm:isCheckedInVersion = 0 AND ecm:isTrashed =0 AND dc:title ILIKE '%?%' AND ecm:primaryType IN ('FVWord', 'FVPhrase'))

coreQueryPageProvider.name: all_shared_videos
coreQueryPageProvider.pattern: SELECT * FROM FVVideo WHERE (ecm:path STARTSWITH '/FV/Workspaces/' AND ecm:mixinType != 'HiddenInNavigation' AND ecm:isCheckedInVersion = 0 AND ecm:isTrashed =0 AND ecm:currentLifeCycleState != 'Disabled' AND dc:title ILIKE '%?%') AND (fva:dialect='?' OR (fvm:shared = 1 AND ecm:currentLifeCycleState != 'New'))

coreQueryPageProvider.name: all_shared_pictures
coreQueryPageProvider.pattern: SELECT * FROM FVPicture WHERE (ecm:path STARTSWITH '/FV/Workspaces/' AND ecm:mixinType != 'HiddenInNavigation' AND ecm:isCheckedInVersion = 0 AND ecm:isTrashed =0 AND ecm:currentLifeCycleState != 'Disabled' AND dc:title ILIKE '%?%') AND (fva:dialect='?' OR (fvm:shared = 1 AND ecm:currentLifeCycleState != 'New'))

coreQueryPageProvider.name: all_shared_audio
coreQueryPageProvider.pattern: SELECT * FROM FVAudio WHERE (ecm:path STARTSWITH '/FV/Workspaces/' AND ecm:mixinType != 'HiddenInNavigation' AND ecm:isCheckedInVersion = 0 AND ecm:isTrashed =0 AND ecm:currentLifeCycleState != 'Disabled' AND dc:title ILIKE '%?%') AND (fva:dialect='?' OR (fvm:shared = 1 AND ecm:currentLifeCycleState != 'New'))

coreQueryPageProvider.name: in_verbending_suggestion
coreQueryPageProvider.pattern: SELECT * FROM INVerbEnding WHERE (ecm:mixinType != 'HiddenInNavigation' AND ecm:isCheckedInVersion = 0 AND ecm:isTrashed =0 AND dc:title ILIKE '?%')

coreQueryPageProvider.name: in_morpheme_suggestion
coreQueryPageProvider.pattern: SELECT * FROM INMorpheme WHERE (ecm:mixinType != 'HiddenInNavigation' AND ecm:isCheckedInVersion = 0 AND ecm:isTrashed =0 AND dc:title ILIKE '?%')

coreQueryPageProvider.name: in_phrase_suggestion
coreQueryPageProvider.pattern: SELECT * FROM INPhrase WHERE (ecm:mixinType != 'HiddenInNavigation' AND ecm:isCheckedInVersion = 0 AND ecm:isTrashed =0 AND dc:title ILIKE '?%')

configuration.title: Header
configuration.description: The header widget just displays the widget label.

description.p: The Files displays an editable list of files, using javascript to keep the uploaded file path when adding several files in a row.
Items are defined using sub wigdets configuration.
This is actually a template widget type whose template uses a <nxu:inputList /> tag in edit or create mode, and a table iterating over items in other modes.
